name: Dead End (itch) (Flying Oak Games)
description:
*** All proceeds of this game will go to Special Effect ***

Dead End is a fast paced and action packed runner set in a post-apocalyptic world.

Coming directly from the 70′s, Dead End is a mix between old-fashioned racing games and grindhouse horror movies.

Stream Dead End's OST online: http://sparklingvinegar.bandcamp.com/

Credits:

  • Code & game design: Flying Oak Games
  • Graphics: Sparkling Vinegar
  • Music: Pierre Kowalski & Simon Maller

Game also available on Google Play, the OUYA Store & the Windows Store for FREE (no ads, no IAP).
